metadata.name: Snowed In
metadata.description:
For four friends, a relaxing cabin vacation takes a turn for the worse when a blizzard rolls in. Add to that the arrival of a stranger warning that "it" is coming for them. It wants them dead. But what is it? And how far will they go to protect themselves?

This self-contained, 40 page one-shot is written by Shawn "Fracture" Gabborin, with beautifully rendered, atmospheric art by Rick Lundeen.
